tool_description: Assesses collision probability between satellite and other space objects using conjunction analysis.

primary_position_km.description: Primary satellite position vector [x,y,z] in km

primary_velocity_kmps.description: Primary satellite velocity vector [vx,vy,vz] in km/s

secondary_positions_km.description: Array of secondary object position vectors

secondary_velocities_kmps.description: Array of secondary object velocity vectors

collision_threshold_km.description: Minimum separation distance for collision risk in km

error_messages: Array dimension mismatch: secondary_positions_km and secondary_velocities_kmps must have equal length.
Invalid state vectors: All position and velocity vectors must contain exactly 3 numeric elements.
Invalid parameters: analysis_duration_hours must be > 0, collision_threshold_km must be > 0, position_uncertainty_km must be > 0.
usage: Provide primary satellite state and arrays of secondary object states. Tool performs conjunction analysis over specified time window.

collision_probabilities.description: Collision probability for each secondary object

closest_approach_times.description: Times of closest approach in UTC ISO 8601 format

high_risk_objects.description: Indices of objects with collision probability > 1e-6
